MenuBar.description: A container with sub-menus and avatar
MenuBar.children_orientation_description: Menu deatils are accordions where all items are in list format

functionality.sidebar_toggle: a toggle feature that allows the sidebar to be hidden or shown along with resizing to show only icons
functionality.search_&_select: A functionality that combines search and selection features, allowing users to search for specific items within a list or dropdown and select the desired option. It may include features like filtering options based on search queries, autocomplete suggestions, and dynamic updating of results based on user input.
